programme.sub-title: S02 : E21 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E22 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E23 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E24 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E25 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E26 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlene's one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school. For Bruce, quality construction materials and workmanship are of paramount importance. One thing the entire family agrees on is that the backyard should have a fantastic entertainment space since they spend plenty of time together outdoors and enjoy having guests over.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlene's one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school. For Bruce, quality construction materials and workmanship are of paramount importance. One thing the entire family agrees on is that the backyard should have a fantastic entertainment space since they spend plenty of time together outdoors and enjoy having guests over.

programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines, each country has its own unique charms to offer the would-be buyers. Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E21 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E22 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E23 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E24 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E25 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E26 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlene's one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school. For Bruce, quality construction materials and workmanship are of paramount importance. One thing the entire family agrees on is that the backyard should have a fantastic entertainment space since they spend plenty of time together outdoors and enjoy having guests over.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eve's challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they can't agree on is where to live. Ashley wants an estate home outside the city that has an outdoor pool and beautifully manicured gardens. Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesn't want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC. Good sized guest rooms and a large backyard are a must. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey, Mike Donia and Daryl King review their favourite homes. Steve takes us down memory lane to his 18th century farmhouse, and another home with a stunning infinity pool. Daryl's listings range from King city to Caloden, with helicopter pads and sprawling backyards. Mike brings us back to his fabulous listings in Thailand. He shows us a home made entirely of Bamboo, and billion-dollar property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style they'll like? They also want a pool and a home theatre.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 Money Buys Justice
programme.desc: A man under the influence states money will buy his freedom after threatening police with a gun. Individuals arrested for possession blame each other. A man arrested for drunk driving becomes unruly.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 International Police
programme.desc: An angry man refuses to cooperate during the booking process. A man claims to be part of the “international police”.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E35 Child of God
programme.desc: One man booked for intoxication is placed in a sobering cell for being uncooperative. An aggrieved woman claims Animal Control took her “baby.” A man tells officers he is a “child of God” and actor.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E43 Pot For Poker
programme.desc: A woman who was nabbed for jaywalking claims the police were out of line for arresting her. A woman is brought in on domestic-violence charges, and a drug peddler claims he's selling to support his addiction to poker.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Big Angry Man
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, NV an upset inmate damages the door on a patrol car. In Portland, OR a man over-estimates the legal consequences of his actions. In Tacoma, WA a couple charged with domestic violence denies getting physical even though there’s blood in the woman’s hair.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Duel of Nitwits
programme.desc: Officers outwit a man who refuses to give his name. A repeat DUI offender is jailed yet again. An intoxicated man is taken into custody and once the alcohol wears off he reveals that he’s broken his sobriety.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E26 Pink Champagne
programme.desc: A man admits to urinating in public. A couple spends their date night in jail after being over served, and a DUI suspect passes out during booking.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E36 Landlord Attack
programme.desc: An inmate swallows a stash of drugs and then comes down with a case of the munchies. A 72-year-old offers an unusual excuse for dealing drugs to teens at a mall, and a woman charged with assaulting a landlord fakes being sick to get out of jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E06 School of Rock

programme.title: Jail

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E40 The Little Fighter
programme.desc: An aspiring martial-arts fighter tries to wriggle out of handcuffs and gets stuck. A football rivalry takes a bad turn when a Steelers fan assaults a Ravens fan.

programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT officers break up an altercation between two inmates. In Portland, OR a belligerent man questions the authorities. In Sarasota, FL a man is busted for DUI. In Las Vegas, NV a woman is taken into custody for battery.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E27 Singing Peg Leg
programme.desc: A prisoner refuses to exit his cell prompting an elaborate extraction. A man begins singing in response to his arrest. During a severe alcohol withdrawal, an inmate repeatedly escapes his restraints.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Teary Eyed Tagger
programme.desc: In Portland, OR an intoxicated male suspect is brought in for DUI. In Salt Lake City, UT a happy drunk woman is pleasantly cooperative. An emotional detainee sheds some tears while in isolation. In Las Vegas, NV a man is strapped in a restraining chair.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 Fake Seizure
programme.desc: A man in detention is paranoid about officers handling him inappropriately. A man in custody claims to have a seizure. A man is taken in to custody for stealing videogaming equipment.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E29 Footloose

programme.title: Jail

programme.desc: A woman booked for domestic violence begins screaming and can’t calm down. Two friends arrested for public intoxication embrace in a tearful reunion. Later, a woman is brought in with a stolen car.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Toilet Paper Love Song
programme.desc: A man attempts to eat marijuana in jail. The Special Detention Unit investigates forbidden letters hidden amongst inmates. A bloody, vicious brawl escalates between an imprisoned duo.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 Old Habits Die Hard
programme.desc: An inmate demands that officers follow her instructions while in jail. A man insists that he has been kidnapped by the police and is being held illegally. An elderly man discovers that domestic violence does not have an age limit. A young woman makes the hard decision to turn herself in to change her life around.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 That Bites
programme.desc: In Sarasota, FL an unruly detainee is sent to isolation, twice. In Multnomah county a young man feverishly waits for his release. In Portland, OR a man is jailed for bitting his girlfriend.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S04 : E20 Coopertive Cons
programme.desc: An intoxicated woman clashes with officers but later shows that good behavior pays off. An experienced prostitute gives solid advice to a younger woman and begs her to get out of the “game.” An angry woman smashes her cheating boyfriend’s windshield.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E19 Observers
programme.desc: Boisterous inmates are placed in restraints after initiating several verbal altercations. A woman struggles with substance abuse following the death of her fianc̩, and two young escorts discuss their "observing" strategy when casino hopping.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E23 Spit Mask Drunk
programme.desc: Deputies deal with chaos after volatile inmates begin fighting. Accusations of deceit plague a booking as a woman is arrested for drunk driving. Prisoners are restrained after causing a commotion.

programme.title: Jail

programme.desc: Acts of aggression cause a man to be placed in a restraint chair. Jail lockdown occurs after an inmate is stabbed with a pencil. After being booked for road rage a woman unleashes a venomous tirade.

programme.title: Jail

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E08 Cousins
programme.desc: A woman is charged with possession of a controlled substance. A woman denies assaulting her husband, and two aggressive cousins threaten police and end up in isolation.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E34 Domestic Mess
programme.desc: An inmate interrupts the booking process. A couple is brought in after signs of a domestic dispute but claim they were being intimate, and a jailed woman shares some of her Webcam exploits.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Crack Pipe on Phone Wall
programme.desc: Chaos surrounds a routine medical screening of an inmate. In the prison phone center, a smoking pipe is discovered and a mystery ensues. A pregnant woman is investigated over potential sex crimes.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Locked Out
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a disorderly man in the detention center is sent to the padded room. A Sarasota, FL man hurls insults at officers while in custody. In Portland, OR a drunk and destructive young man is placed in the drunk-tank. In Las Vegas, NV a woman tries to lie about the reasons behind her detention.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E03 Pregnant Hooker
programme.desc: A strip search reveals a male inmate in women's lingerie. A couple of puppy thieves get amorous in the bathroom, and a pregnant woman is arrested for solicitation.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 OJ
programme.desc: A media circus surrounds OJ Simpson as he is placed in jail for violating his bail agreement. During a body search, a man is tased and pepper-sprayed. A parole violation calls for all hands-on deck.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 I'm Not Jane Doe
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a lewd woman is jailed. In Las Vegas, NV a man is placed in the restraining chair after attempting to bite his own fingers off. In Portland, OR a man is brought in for possession. In Sarasota, FL a homeless man is brought in for trespassing and battery.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Meth Rage
programme.desc: Officers conduct a strip search after an inmate is accused of carrying contraband. A repeat offender dances for deputies and fellow inmates. High on meth, a man acts erratically during booking.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 Hawaii 5-0
programme.desc: A man claims royal lineage during a combative booking process. After resisting officers and harboring a vicious animal, a man is arrested. Later, intoxicated individuals create havoc for officers.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E42 Exercise With Caution
programme.desc: An uncooperative inmate complicates things. A man charged with DUI complains about the prison food. A security guard arrested for robbery fears that her dream job with Homeland Security is gone.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S04 : E14 One Too Many Times
programme.desc: A man learns it’s never a good idea to light up a joint next to an active crime scene. An officer encourages a young drug addicted couple to seek treatment. Luck runs out for a tutu-wearing prostitute, and officers pick up an at-risk kid for their 93rd time.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E12 Housing Fight
programme.desc: Needles are found on one woman while a stun gun is discovered on another. A DUI test stirs up bad memories for a man driving while intoxicated, and a convicted murderer becomes violent.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E06 Sinister Sisters
programme.desc: Two sisters go on a mini-crime spree, get caught and find no one will bail them out. A domestic argument about night fishing lands a husband in jail for breaking into his own car. An irate inmate blows off steam by doing laps in her jail cell. A woman finds out it’s hard to stop selling drugs when the neighborhood knows her business.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E16 Lone Star Clown
programme.desc: Officers warn a man that dressing up like a clown in Texas is not a good idea. A shotgun is found in the hoodie of a man arrested for riding his bicycle without a headlight. A young couple wonders how pot ended up in their possession. Officers are surprised at the amazing amount of pot one can smoke.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E23 Blondie and Clyde
programme.desc: A woman gives officers a hard time in booking when she refuses to comply. A catwoman is arrested for hitting her date at a club, and a pusherman discusses his contributions to the economy.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Homeless Hospitality
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, NV an intoxicated man is strapped to a restraining chair. In Portland, OR a seemingly gracious man is arrested for assault. In Spokane, WA a homeless man is brought in for assault. In Salt Lake City, UT a frequent visitor is brought in for threating the security staff at a local bar with a firearm.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E33 Moneybags
programme.desc: Three inmates start brawling inside the drunk tank. One man must wear a mask so that officers can avoid his rain of spit. A young woman fails to take jail seriously and behaves provocatively.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E32 Gulf War Soldier
programme.desc: By proclaiming that he is a Gulf War Veteran, a man states he should be imprisoned. A corporal investigates a “prisoner on prisoner assault.” An Officer’s last shift is filled with fireworks.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E12 Throw in the Towel
programme.desc: A man arrested for domestic violence threatens to put all the officers in jail. Inmates on kitchen duty get into a fist fight over a dish towel. A woman unsure about her sexual identity is arrested for trespassing at a friend’s home. Officers find an unusual bit of clothing when a man is changed into a jail uniform.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E05 Overflowed
programme.desc: An inmate claims to be the victim of an internet scam which led to his arrest. Officers take it easy on a rowdy inmate struggling through a spiritual crisis. Years of prison time can’t sway a young gang affiliate from changing his ways. Prisoners cause plumbing problems to send a message. A mother and daughter bond over being locked up together.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S04 : E09 LV NYE
programme.desc: We follow the men and women of LVMPD as they do their best to tame the New Year's Eve festivities up and down the Las Vegas Strip.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Family Man
programme.desc: In his holding cell, a man fights officers after taking Xanax. An officer discovers a suspect may be facing criminal charges for his son. K-9 units are needed during a search for improvised weapons.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E09 DUI Death
programme.desc: An inmate fails to impress the staff with his witticisms. A woman boasts about excelling at her DUI field test, and a man learns his wreckless driving has resulted in the death of a man.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S04 : E19 Sage Wiz-dumb
programme.desc: A woman arrested 45 times gives advice to recently released drug users. Two Australian brothers can’t understand why playing a game of “footie” in a hotel hallway would land them in jail. A drunken nightclub security guard wrecks his scooter.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Phone Banger
programme.desc: A hysterical woman is transferred to an isolation cell. A woman shows her undying LA pride to the arresting officers. A young woman is put under observation for threatening harm to herself.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Mean Marine
programme.desc: In Sarasota, FL officers place a hostile former Marine in isolation. In Portland, OR officers take a man into custody for joyriding in a stolen car. In Las Vegas, NV a jailed man is more concerned about the condition of his car rather than the people involved in the accident that was hospitalized.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E37 Fearless
programme.desc: Toting his guitar, an inmate serenades the officers. One man protests his arrest and states that having cocaine is not a crime. A man claims to be an Iraqi War Veteran and challenges his detainment.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E18 Good Citizen
programme.desc: A woman refuses to wear jail-issued clothing. A man tells his tearful tale to officers, and a chatty inebriated woman is placed in isolation.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Running Wild
programme.desc: A disorderly man shouts to the heavens and asks for divine intervention. Twin brothers are arrested after a fray with police. A man in women’s clothing is booked after harassing passengers on a bus.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E28 King of Karate
programme.desc: An intoxicated man thinks the doctors are CIA agents. A homeless karate practitioner's actions land him in an isolated cell, and a Canadian man with no pants wants to arm wrestle.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E11 The Wild One
programme.desc: A woman is brought in for attacking her boyfriend. A talkative inmate is moved to isolation, and an daring inmate attempts to escape his restraints.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E33 Little Big Man
programme.desc: A dominatrix is arrested for playing rough. A father is accused of assaulting his daughter's boyfriend, and an inmate's negative attitude leads to trouble.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S04 : E12 Mas Tequila
programme.desc: Tequila is to blame when a man's behavior gets him locked up. A woman tries to sell drugs online. A detainee in holding for a DUI is of the opinion that he’s been jailed for driving too slow.

programme.desc: A woman stalking David Copperfield is arrested. An inebriated inmate voices her displeasure with the guards, and a man nabbed for driving under the influence of prescription drugs howls for his dog.

programme.sub-title: S06 : E39 Occupied By Psoriasis

programme.desc: A man fresh out of prison tries to prove how tough he is. A drunk woman rages against everyone in her path. programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Attention Junkie
programme.desc: A woman is placed in isolation after disparaging other inmates. Alarms blare while a fight erupts in the shower room among inmates. A man booked into jail is revealed to have a 20-year arrest record.

programme.desc: Officers have difficulty booking an incomprehensible man. A commotion at a church ends in arrest. A man wearing a tuxedo is detained after mocking officers for wearing “pig suits.”

programme.desc: In Sarasota, FL a man is busted for an open container of beer. In Salt Lake City, UT a woman is stunned as to how drug paraphernalia wound up on her person. programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E27 Drunk in Love
programme.desc: Hitching a ride home with the wrong guy almost lands one woman in the slammer. A known prostitute won’t be going on a second date. When a domestic partner refuses to leave home, officers intervene.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E02 Pain in the Neck
programme.desc: Deputies confront a man holding a knife to his roommate’s neck over a prior argument. A suspect runs from Deputies on a warrant charge. Suspected robbers are pulled over by Deputies.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E12 The Car is Mine!
programme.desc: A man locks himself in a trunk after deputies respond to a restraining order call. Deputies respond to two women arguing over the ownership of a car. A driver comes clean to a deputy during a traffic stop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E02 Checked Luggage
programme.desc: Agents of the US Customs and Border Protection pursue a vehicle. Border agents spot two undocumented people while scanning train tracks. Airport Customs detains a man when agents suspect he might be carrying more than luggage.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E15 Lady Bit My Finger
programme.desc: Three men try to convince cops they had no idea their vehicle was stolen. Officers respond after a partygoer mistakes another guest’s finger for dessert. A domestic abuse suspect makes police run through the streets.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E01 Running Amok
programme.desc: An assailant attacks a woman after bumping into her. A woman is arrested for spilling beer on a cameraman’s equipment. Two intoxicated women are placed under arrest after a physical altercation.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E04 Drive Thru Blues
programme.desc: Officers respond to a call reporting an officer-involved fight. A brazen driver careens into a ditch after failing to yield. A berserk woman is pulled over for her erratic driving.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E02 Read the Signs
programme.desc: Police follow a car after it leaves a drug house. A police officer in Las Vegas goes undercover posing as a ‘john.’ Officers give chase when they observe a car making an illegal U-Turn.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E19 Strange Encounters
programme.desc: A kind man gets more than he bargained for from his new roommate. Cops discover the unexpected consequences of punching a scooter. Officers stop a sober suspect who may not be from the same planet as them.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E31 Nothing Upstairs
programme.desc: Officers pursue a motorcyclist driving erratically. Deputies find broken drug paraphernalia in a car when conducting a traffic stop. A man who beat up his girlfriend hides from officers in an attic.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E17 Give Me My Money
programme.desc: A reckless driver claims he wants to kill himself. A woman steals $1,700 from a man trying to buy drugs. Police arrest a man for drinking a driving.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E16 Amnesia Can Happen
programme.desc: Police officers set up a sting operation using a taxi cab in to bust prostitution. A man claims he can’t remember his ‘girlfriend’s’ name when officers suspect the woman is actually a stranger. Female undercover officers set up a sting operation to bust johns.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E36 Extreme COPS
programme.desc: Several squad cars join together in pursuit of a pickup truck. Officers conduct a drug raid utilizing percussion grenades. A suspect wanted for numerous robberies flees from Police in a sports car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E26 Copy of Leave her Alone
programme.desc: A shots fired investigation results in a foot pursuit and the recovery of a discarded firearm. An officer intervenes in a family dispute involving a daughter, boyfriend and $9,000 in warrants. Three women are questioned in connection to a suspicious vehicle.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E01 Batter Up
programme.desc: After a tow service employee denies a woman her car back, she uses his body for batting practice. A man with a warrant explains his medicinal meth use. No lie is too big for a couple trying to convince officers they didn’t shoplift.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E15 Graveyard Shiftiness
programme.desc: Officers detect a strong odor of marijuana during a routine traffic stop. A woman tells Officers her inebriated boyfriend smashed a window. Police investigate a suspicious vehicle parked behind a cemetery.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E20 Pup and Rescue
programme.desc: A driver denies ownership of what police find in his car. Police conduct a narcotics sting that nets several arrests. A deputy removes a pooch from the scene of an accident.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E05 Wardrobe Clash
programme.desc: A homeless man hides from deputies in the closet of an empty house. Officers called to a shooting find a man covered in blood. Deputies arrive to a domestic disturbance to find two brothers fighting over a pair of sandals.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E23 Traveling Fast
programme.desc: Officers pursue a vehicle traveling up to 100mph. An officer is dispatched to a larceny in progress at a convenience store. Dispatch informs officers that a man threatened an elderly woman.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E13 Rooted with Problems
programme.desc: A sibling calls authorities when his belligerent brother refuses to leave. Officers respond to a shoplifting call at a grocery store. Officers investigate a suspicious vehicle at a local gas station.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E23 Nudged Out
programme.desc: Officers pursue a male suspect in a speeding truck and ultimately force the vehicle off the road, the suspect is taken into custody without injury. Officers respond to a domestic abuse call. Officers are called to a home where a dead body is found.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E09 Gimme a Break
programme.desc: Officers pursue two brothers after an attempted bank robbery. A confused man with a shotgun calls police after hearing voices. A man asks deputies for a break after they find illegal items in his truck.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E23 Check Please!
programme.desc: Deputies confront an intoxicated man who threatened a restaurant owner. A man tells officers he can assault who he wants. Officers are called to an altercation over a sleeping bag and a backpack.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E01 Fight and Flight
programme.desc: A suspect flees as officers respond to a fight call. A belligerent meth user refuses to cooperate after being pulled over. A cranky husband gets busted for pot after his wife kicks over his Harley.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E01 She Came Onto Me
programme.desc: An undercover police officer sets up a sting to buy drugs. Officers find a surprise in a suspect’s trunk. A man claims that a prostitute has kidnapped him.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E23 UC Drug Sting II
programme.desc: Officers give chase to a suspect driving a stolen vehicle. A bio-hazard bin an illegal knife and drugs are found during a traffic stop. Agents go undercover in an area known for heavy drug activity.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E13 I’ll Raise My Voice Right Back
programme.desc: The new chief in town oversees a series of undercover drug buys. Officers arrest a drunken man who can’t stop talking. A domestic abuse suspect admits to laying the smack down on her mooching husband.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E26 Not a Momma's Boy
programme.desc: Officers are called to fight between a mother and her son. Officers respond to a man on a trolley hurling racial slurs at a passenger. A traffic stop uncovers narcotics in a young man’s trunk.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E06 Foul Prowl
programme.desc: Officers respond after a bloody man is seen prowling around an apartment complex. Officers pull over a suspicious vehicle. Police seize drugs and a large knife from a bicyclist.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E01 He's the Gingerbread Man
programme.desc: A man wanted for unpaid child support hides from deputies. Officers respond to a sexual predator following a minor. A man with a checkered driving record crashes his car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E30 That’s Not Ours
programme.desc: Officers search for suspects stealing rims at a car dealership. A married couple claim drugs found in their car were from a nearby ditch. Officers detain an inebriated man arguing with a store clerk.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E28 All Bottled up
programme.desc: Officers in Boston bust a drug dealer in the midst of a transaction. Two adult men are questioned and later arrested for throwing bottles out of a moving vehicle. Officers set up a suspect who’s a known online predator in a sting operation.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E34 Copy of Warning shot
programme.desc: Officers respond to an assault call at a local residence. A juvenile with a firearm is detained. Officers respond to a report of a man firing a gun in front of his residence.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E22 Dude, I'm sorry
programme.desc: An Officer’s patrol of an area known for drug activity turns into a foot chase that ends with the suspect running into a tree. An altercation following a minor car accident is resolved after the men apologize for their parts in the confrontation. Two suspects are arrested during an undercover sting designed to capture online child predators.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E18 Not Your Papi
programme.desc: A man in New Jersey is arrested for possession. A couple is pulled over while looking to score. A routine traffic stop turns into a fruitful drug bust.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S25 : E09 Feeling the Breeze
programme.desc: A truck driver decides to hide from police in the last place they’ll look: his own house. A man out on a beer run is robbed at knifepoint. In Portland a man decides to go nude for a bike ride.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E17 Backseat Denial
programme.desc: An officer struggles with a man reaching for something in his pocket. A man won’t cop to the gun in his backseat. Police arrive on the scene when a man threatens to shoot his wife.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E18 Momma's Boy
programme.desc: The suspect of a carjacking tells an Officer that he would rather go to jail than face the wrath of his mother. An Officer investigates a domestic call involving a husband, wife and a lamp. A slow speed pursuit ensues and the suspects are booked for felony, eluding, and drugs.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E07 Finding Fido
programme.desc: A drunk man threatens both firefighters and the police. Police are called over a dispute regarding an alleged missing dog. A drunk driver changes his story when his friend is found pinned under his car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S25 : E13 I Take This Criminal
programme.desc: During an arrest, a suspect decides to pop the question to his girlfriend. An abandoned house becomes the target of burglary. Two brothers’ dispute over a business matter leads to violence.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E21 Beer Run
programme.desc: A carjacking results in a chase and a flipped vehicle. Suspects crash a truck after attempting to steal beer. A man attempts to swallow his drugs during a bust.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S25 : E12 Above the Law
programme.desc: A foot chase gets complicated when the suspect proves he’s not in good health. A suspect believes he doesn’t need to follow the rules of the road. A man calls the police on his ex-girlfriend when she makes a moving mistake.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E12 On the Run
programme.desc: Two suspects lead Officers on a high speed pursuit. An Officer discovers two men have warrants after a traffic stop. A man hides from the police after a domesitc disturbance call.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S25 : E16 Garden of Crime
programme.desc: Deputies question a woman they believe to be a prostitute working the Las Vegas Strip. A woman tries to pin ownership of drug paraphernalia on an absent friend. A man consents to let officers in his backyard, but he confesses to his own trespasses first.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E02 Hood Flip
programme.desc: A police chase becomes more dangerous when the hood of a stolen vehicle flips open. A purse snatcher denies robbing a woman. A limping man with a knee injury denies crashing his car into a tree.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E28 Bad Fences make for Bad Neighbors
programme.desc: Officers are involved in a high-speed pursuit of suspected larcenists. Officers give a driver a sobriety test. Officers report to a call of a dispute in a neighborhood.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E12 Safe Cracking
programme.desc: A man stages a sit-in in his car in an attempt to stop it from being towed. A homeowner denies that he’s selling drugs despite the large amount of evidence found in his home. A safe full of evidence is found during a traffic stop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E12 Wreckless Tenants
programme.desc: A bewildered driver claims that he did not see the lights or hear the sirens when signaled to stop. A manager of an apartment complex is assaulted by their intoxicated tenants.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E15 All The World's Our Bedroom
programme.desc: Officers are called to remove a man sleeping in a parking spot at Wal-Mart. A free-spirited couple takes their relationship to their front lawn. A resident brings a knife to a meeting with his building property manager.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E16 Can't Run from Motorola
programme.desc: A suspect attempts to discard drugs during a foot chase. A man fails to pull over for minor infraction and then bails out his car on foot. A man is arrested after being spotted in a drug transaction.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E21 Undercover Blues
programme.desc: Police work a sting that targets drug dealers. An undercover sting discovers narcotics trafficking. Police respond to a burglary in progress and discover a flop house.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E15 Jumping to Conclusions
programme.desc: Officers encounter an unusual situation where the victim and suspect have defiantly barricaded themselves inside the house. Officers respond to a domestic dispute at a nearby apartment complex.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E14 Release & Catch
programme.desc: An officer pulls over an erratic driver while on the way to a shots fired call. An officer attempts to stop a resistant motorcyclist. Officers respond to a domestic violence call involving an intoxicated man and a woman with warrants.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E24 Kick the Car
programme.desc: Officers intervene when an estranged husband kicks his ex-wife’s boyfriend’s car. A man claims someone gave him the car he is driving. A woman claims the pills in her purse are not hers.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E22 Dealt A Bad Hand
programme.desc: Multiple suspects spill out in a mad scramble when their vehicle flips over in a pursuit. A distraught man complains that a stranger tried to lasso him with a metal necklace. A driver has trouble staying in his lane after a lousy night of poker.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E19 Make it a Large Soda
programme.desc: A motorcyclist refuses to stop for the police and later tries to escape on foot. A pedestrian is found to have a large soda cup full of anything but soda. A man calls for police help when he’s verbally attacked on a city bus.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E23 Bad Day, Bad Luck
programme.desc: A man is questioned for assaulting a woman on a train. Surveillance captured a man burglarizing a casino. A father kicks his son out of the house after his drinking becomes problematic.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E03 Settling Debts
programme.desc: Two cousins fight over a five dollar debt. Police arrest a man for domestic violence. A taxi cab driver is robbed and shot.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E30 John Be Gone
programme.desc: Men seeking the services of a prostitute are arrested during a sting operation. New Jersey Police investigate a potential organized attack on a female suspect. Locals detain a man after he’s caught burglarizing property in the area.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E07 Auto Focus
programme.desc: A man with a knife tries to evade police by hiding in bushes. Vice Unit Officers conduct a prostitution sting. When Officers are shot at during a pursuit, the woman claims it was flashes from a camera.

programme.title: Tom the Tow Truck
programme.desc: Poznaj Toma, wynalazcę z Samochodzikowa! W swoim nowoczesnym laboratorium tworzy wynalazki, aby rozwiązać problemy przyjaciół.

programme.title: Tom's Garage
programme.desc: Tom the Tow Truck pomaga swoim przyjaciołom z Car City, gdy ci potrzebują naprawy. Zawsze daje im coś specjalnego po każdej pracy.

programme.title: Tom's Paint Shop
programme.desc: Zatrzymaj się w warsztacie Toma Holownika! Ten kreatywny malarz z radością ulepszy i nada swoim przyjaciołom nowy, świeży wygląd.

programme.title: AnimaCars Discovery
programme.desc: Poznaj Jonny'ego Toolboxa i AnimaCars i dołącz do ich licznych misji ratunkowych, aby przywrócić spokój w Animatown!

programme.title: Car Patrol
programme.desc: Wszyscy w Samochodzikowie troszczą się o siebie nawzajem. Patrol to specjalny zespół, który dba o bezpieczeństwo mieszkańców.

programme.title: Construction Squad
programme.desc: Zespół budowlany buduje Samochodzikowo cegła po cegle! Pokazują, że wszystko jest możliwe z pomocą naszych przyjaciół.

programme.title: Learning with AnimaCars
programme.desc: Odkryjmy liczby, litery, kolory i kształty poprzez zabawne i ekscytujące zadania na świeżym powietrzu z załogą AnimaCars!

programme.title: Monster Town
programme.desc: Poznaj Monster Trucks, ciężko pracujące samochody, które łączą siły, aby pomóc przyjaciołom i mieszkańcom Monster City.

programme.title: RoboFuse
programme.desc: Robo wraz ze swoimi lojalnymi przyjaciółmi chroni Samochodzikowo przed planami Zitrona, chcącego ukraść źródło energii miasta.

programme.title: Pinkfong Wonderstar
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Episode 2
programme.desc: Poki invented Pokibot, a robot that would do everything you need! But something happened. No! Pokibot kicked Poki out of the house! So Poki visits Wonderstar for a help and then... Wonderville's adorable Beaver, Jojo couldn't sleep for a week already! Wonderstar seeks out for the disturbing sound from a deep dark cave...

programme.title: Learn ABC with Baby Shark
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Learn ABC with Baby Shark
programme.desc: Hotdog, Icecream, Lollipop Jelly, Sauage, Toast Icecream, Cookie, Bacon Donut, Chocolate, Pancake Waffle, etc.

programme.title: Pinkfong Wonderstar
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Episode 3
programme.desc: That shiny crown should be mine...! Billi wants Pinkfong's crown and creates a fake detective test to lure Wonderstar. If Wonderstar wins, they will receive a golden badge but if not, the crown will be gone. The test now begins! Wonder... star? Can you help me dance again? After the record player is broken, Frido can only go hippity hippity hop! Don’t worry Frido, Wonderstar will get your hops to hop!

programme.title: Pinkfong Wonderstar
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Episode 4
programme.desc: Llia, can you finish your painting this time? There is always one concern for Lyra who is always positive. Something always stops Lila from finishing the pantings. Let's find out what it is with Wonderstar! Billi challenges Jeni, the fastest runner in Wonderville! Jeni VS Billi, who would be the final winner of the running competition?

programme.title: Pinkfong Car Mechanic
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Episode 2
programme.desc: Welcome to the Pinkfong Repair Shop. Feel free to drop by!

programme.title: Pinkfong Super Rescue Team
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Episode 1
programme.desc: We Are The Pinkfong's Super Rescue Team! We solve all the problems in the town! Meet Roger the Police Car, Ready the Fire Truck, Forrest the Ambulance, Cloudia the Helicopter. Vroom Vroom, I am the Fire Truck Ready, dreaming of becoming a super-fire car! You're watching "Ready, the Fire Truck's Day", an educational and interactive Super Rescue Team series prepared to you by Pinkfong!

programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Episode 6
programme.desc: Learn colors with Hogi and Wonderville Friends!

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Ninimo Animal Songs
programme.desc: Pinkfong's new friend Ninimo! Shall we sing animal songs together?

programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 Sing along with Pinkfong and Hogi 5
programme.desc: Come sing along with adorable Pinkfong and Hogi!

programme.title: Dance Adventure
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Episode 3
programme.desc: Arrr-! Are you ready for a fun adventure? Come and let's sing and dance together! Arrr-!

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Episode 1
programme.desc: It's time to play with Baby Shark! What kind of games do you want to play?

programme.title: Let's Dance Along together!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Episode 1
programme.desc: I’ve got the rhythm in my elbows. Elbows! I’ve got the rhythm in my knees. Knees! I’ve got the rhythm in my feet. Stomp, stomp! Feet! I’ve got the rhythm in my eyes!

programme.title: The Way Bebefinn Learns
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Way Bebefinn Learns
programme.desc: Bebefinn~ Wake up! It's morning! What should we do when we wake up in the morning? Let's learn with Bebefinn!

programme.title: Love Is All Around the World
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Love Is All Around the World
programme.desc: Let's go on a journey aboard the heart boat and the heart hot air balloon! Travel around the world with Baby Shark and say "I love you" in various languages.

programme.title: No No Shark, Yes Yes Shark
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 No No Shark, Yes Yes Shark
programme.desc: Baby Shark and Thief Baby Shark, who avoided tasks like going to kindergarten, brushing teeth, or eating vegetables, suddenly changed their minds! What caused the change?

programme.title: Thief Baby Shark Stole Our Colors
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Thief Baby Shark Stole Our Colors
programme.desc: Thief Baby Shark appeared at the kindergarten with a mysterious vacuum cleaner! It began stealing colors from the playground and the bodies of Baby Shark and friends. Can Baby Shark restore the colors and save the kindergarten?

programme.title: Toy Car Baby Shark to the Rescue
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Episode 1
programme.desc: Oh no! Thief Baby Shark took my friend William! Shark family is on their way to rescue William! Shall we all set out together to catch the Thief Baby Shark? Vroom~!

programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Sing It Loud! 1970-1979

programme.title: The Sound of The Suburbs! 1977-80
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 The Sound of The Suburbs! 1977-80

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Off The Grid Srinagar, India
programme.desc: Alex is in Srinagar putting up on a houseboat. She explores the Dal lake, tries Kashmiri Tea, and ends her day with a traditional Kashmiri platter – Wazwan.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 10 Days Scotland Perth (ENG)
programme.desc: Robbie’s adventures in Perth kick off with him immersing himself in the historic grandeur of the Scone Castle, where a mysterious stone tells tales of Scottish monarchs. But the real thunder of the Highlands awaits at the Braemar Games gathering, where tartan meets brawn, and Robbie learns that embracing his Scottish side involves more than just kilts and castles.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E27 Backpack Novi Sad, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Novi Sad, the financial and industrial hub of Serbia.Starting with canoeing on Danube and later exploring the city and its landmarks.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Boarding Pass Santa Village, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Santa Village at Rovaniemi, where she reads some of the letters that children from around the world write to him.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Bulgaria Sunny Beach
programme.desc: Luxurious hotels, thrilling water parks, inexpensive food and almost 300 days of bright sunny weather make Bulgaria’s biggest seaside resort, Sunny Beach popular for budget beach getaways. Catriona, however, stumbles onto the historic town of Nessebar, which is over 3000 years old, and realizes that there is more to the place than meets the eye. She goes on to visit the Castra Rubra winery, where she finds out about the history of Viticulture in Bulgaria and the process of wine making.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 City Breaks Ahmedabad (ENG)
programme.desc: Benafsha embarks on a whirlwind adventure in Ahmedabad. With just 48 hours in the city, she is determined to make the most of it, but how?

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Food Fact Fun The Hague, Netherlands
programme.desc: From exploring a vintage car museum to scaling a 5 meter ice-wall and sampling a rich bread cookie, Watch Alex exploring The Hague, also known as the “International city of peace”.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 10 Days Scotland Aberdeen (ENG)
programme.desc: A modern European oil city built on the back of a rich maritime heritage, Aberdeen is the energetic kingpin of northeast Scotland. While the boom times may come and go, the dynamic coastal metropolis never ceases to thrill with its free museums, outdoor adventures and natural attractions right on the city’s doorstep.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E28 Backpack Pozarevac, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Požarevac and visits the ancient town of Viminacium. Later visits National Museum, concluding with Majdanpek’s Rajkova Pecina Caves.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Boarding Pass Rovaniemi, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Rovaniemi, where she visits a husky farm and finds out about about breeding and raising huskies.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Xplore Bulgaria Sofia
programme.desc: For the people of Sofia, preserving its heritage is sacrosanct, and this can be seen in the way the city's infrastructure is built around its archeological treasures. Catriona realizes this when she roams around the cobblestone streets of the city. With every monument she visits, she finds herself transported to a different era, right from Perperikon fort, which narrate stories of the Byzantine empire, to Boyana church, which is home to some of the earliest examples of medieval artwork.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 1(Eng)
programme.desc: From lazing in hammocks by the beach to sipping drinks on a private yacht, Kim realizes that Maldives is the perfect destination to unwind in style.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Food Fact Fun Rotterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying dishes like Stroopwafel and Palat Stoofvlees to visiting the Erasmus bridge, cube houses and wall painting on the streets, Alex explores Rotterdam.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 10 Days Scotland Aberdeenshire (ENG)
programme.desc: Since medieval times Aberdeenshire and its northwestern neighbour Moray have been the richest and most fertile regions of the Highlands. Aberdeenshire is famed for its Aberdeen Angus beef cattle, its many fine castles and the prosperous 'granite city' of Aberdeen.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E29 Backpack Majdanpek, Serbia
programme.desc: Explore Majdanpek with our host as the city brings the viewers closer to the treasures strewn across the Serbian countryside.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Boarding Pass Levi, Finland
programme.desc: Levi is Finland's largest and fastest-growing ski destination. Emeline is here, to find out the exciting activities that Levi offers, in summer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Xplore Bhutan Paro
programme.desc: With snow-capped peaks rising over primeval forests and traditional villages, Paro is like an Oriental Switzerland. On a visit to Paro, Radhika explores famous monasteries such as the Rinpung Dzong and Takstang Monastery, and learns the history and legends associated with them. Along the way, she finds out the secrets to the quintessential Bhutanese peace and contentment.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 2(Eng)
programme.desc: An invigorating spa treatment, a cooking lesson, a snorkeling session – Kim has experiences in the Maldives that leave her completely rejuvenated.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Food Fact Fun Utrecht, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying Orange zest beer and traditional Dutch dishes to exploring St.Martin's Cathedral, Dom Tower and enjoying go karting and stand up paddle boat ride, watch Alex enjoy his trip in Utrecht.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 10 Days Scotland Inverness (ENG)
programme.desc: In the enchanting landscapes of Inverness, Robbie’s journey takes a whimsical turn: from eccentric to downright magical.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E30 Backpack Nis, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Nis,one of the oldest cities in Europe.She visits a concentration camp and later paraglides to end by watching a musical performance.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Boarding Pass Ruka Kuusamo, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline goes to Ruka-Kuusamo, where she tries river rafting. She also meets a reindeer herder,who tells her about the unique ways of herding reindeer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Bhutan Thimpu
programme.desc: Actress and travel enthusiast, Radhika Bangia explores the enigma that is Bhutan, when she visits Thimpu, the capital city with no traffic lights and no skyscrapers invading the skyline. Here, she checks out significant sights such as the Tibetan-style National Memorial Chorten, the National Library and the Folk Heritage Museum in order to understand more about the beliefs, history, architecture and cuisine of Bhutan.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 World Heritage Ancient Temples of Egypt, Egypt (ENG)
programme.desc: Explore the ancient heritage sites of Abu Simbel, the Philae complex of Nubia and the Hatshepsut Temple to unravel the mystical stories behind the ancient temples of Egypt.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Food Fact Fun Gouda, Netherlands
programme.desc: Alex tries traditional Dutch food in Leiden, learns about Dutch history at Prinsenhof Museum, visits a Gothic church, a local cheese market and Delftware factory at Gouda.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 10 Days Scotland Isle Of Skye (ENG)
programme.desc: The grand finale of Robbie’s wild homecoming unfolds amidst the rugged beauty of the Isle of Skye.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 Backpack Resavsk Pecina, Serbia
programme.desc: Continue exploring Serbia with Heather as she visits the Manasija monastery, Resavska caves, ending with a joyride onboard Eight of Sargan rail line.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 With Love From Mauritius Ep 1
programme.desc: Krisann and Nathan’s vacation in Mauritius begins in Le Morne, where an unexpected adventure awaits the latter.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Xplore Bhutan Phobjikha
programme.desc: Known as Druk Yul or the “Land of the Thunder Dragon”, Bhutan is the country of mountains, monasteries and mystery. Radhika Bangia finds this to be true when she visits Punakha, the former capital of Bhutan, where she marvels at the architecture of Punakha Dzong and gets to know the story behind the two rivers, Mo Chhu and Po Chhu. She also explores the sacred temples and Mebar Tsho lake of Bumthang, the religious heart of Bhutan, and gets to know the local legends.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 World Spas Kempenki, Jordan (ENG)
programme.desc: Jamie Srubis tries out spa treatments, which are inspired by the Dead Sea and the desert surroundings at Hotel Kempinski Ishtar in Jordan.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Food Fact Fun Dubai 1
programme.desc: After Burj Khalifa, Alex has a traditional Emirati platter, visits the gold market and skiing rink, and goes for a camel safari and camping.

programme.title: City break
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 City Breaks Innsbruck, Austria
programme.desc: Nestled in the mighty Alps, tour the Austrian city of Innsbruck with Sabrina and explore a town that’s alpine-urban yet traditional in nature.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E32 Backpack Sjenica, Serbia
programme.desc: In her final leg of journey, Heather visits the Uvac canyon, tries locally prepared pie, ending with Kopaonik National Park and Jelovarnik waterfalls.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 With Love From Mauritius Ep 2
programme.desc: On an island-hopping adventure in Mauritius, Krisann and Nathan find out that time works differently on these islands.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 XP Guide Copenhagen, Denmark
programme.desc: A homely place where the aroma of freshly baked bread greets you as people smoothly glide along on their bicycles. Welcome to Copenhagen.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Unwind Hotel Oriole, Sri Lanka
programme.desc: Indeya explores the Cinnamon plantations, tries a local dish and witnesses a traditional dance performance.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Food Fact Fun Dubai 2
programme.desc: Alex has varied experiences in Dubai like trying Lebanese cheese bread, visiting a coffee museum, going to IMG Worlds of Adventure and more.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Food Fact Fun Amsterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: In Amsterdam, Alex tries Bitterballen, cannabis cake and visits Heineken Experience brewery. He explores Zaanse Schans village with windmills and Coster Diamonds, the oldest diamond polishing factory.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 10 Days Scotland Edinburgh (ENG)
programme.desc: Robbie’s journey to reconnect with his Scottish roots begins in Edinburgh, the stunning capital city perched on extinct volcanoes. Navigating the twists of the Royal Mile, strutting around the majestic Edinburgh castle and learning to sip scotch like a true Scotsman, he feels a tad closer to his heritage. The real fun kicks in, however, when he stumbles onto a rather flamboyant way to unleash his inner Highlander.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Xplore Bulgaria Plovdiv
programme.desc: Like Rome, Plovdiv straddles seven hills; but as Europe’s oldest continuously inhabited city, it’s far more ancient. As Catriona takes a tour of the city to see its iconic attractions such as a Roman Amphitheatre, which was once the setting for gladiator fights, and the striking Baroque Saints Constantine and Helena Church, she begins to see how seamlessly modern life blends with the age-old ruins. Along the way, she realizes why Plovdiv is called the ‘Eternal City’ of Bulgaria.

programme.desc: Stockholm, the capital and largest city of Sweden, was built on 14 Islands. This place is also sometimes referred as Venice of the north.

programme.desc: Welcome to WES rounds 3 and 4 of the UCI E-Mountainbike Cross-Country World Cup presented by Schwalbe. We are in Bielstein, Germany, for the second year in a row and the Bielstein Forest Course is the venue for this event and one of Europe's oldest motocross circuits.

programme.title: GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup - Dunkerque (FRA)
